title: What is AI?
content: Artificial intelligence (AI) is a broad field encompassing the development of computer systems capable of performing tasks that typically require human intelligence.  These tasks include learning, reasoning, problem-solving, perception, and natural language understanding.
image_desc:
A stylized graphic depicting a human brain merging with a computer circuit board, symbolizing the integration of human intelligence and artificial intelligence. Type: illustration

### Video Suggestion:
A stock footage video showing a futuristic cityscape with holographic displays and robots interacting with humans.
narration: Hello, and welcome. This presentation will give you a quick overview of what artificial intelligence, or AI, is all about.  In simple terms, AI refers to computer systems that can mimic human intelligence to perform a variety of tasks.  We'll explore this further in the following slides.
